metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5441 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 20d161ace307e28690229b68584f2d84556f8960.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5441` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-athena - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-common - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-gnome - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-gtk - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-gui-common - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-lesstif - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-nox - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-runtime - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
vim-tiny - 2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:7.4.052-1ubuntu3.1+esm14').
